marklogic.body: Those Fools in Modesto's City Hall don't GET IT! Our Police Dept. does not understand the Bill of Rights either? Remedial Rights Training is in order. Unless he yells "FIRE", when none exists- Leave him ALONE. No SpeciaL SPOT. Someone complains, they don't like his speech, Too Bad! Every Police Officer KNOWS He does not have to follow an ILLEGAL Order from a Supervisor! For these type incidents we should require the Head of the City Dept. that gives the foolish order to violate a persons Free Speech rights Personally PAY the Costs of any Lawsuit !. Will the City be 3 times stupid? My guess is, YES!
